text: @realDonaldTrump Yes, yes, you said that coronavirus is just flu is your misconception.  So I want to know about climate change?  Is climate change a Hoax?  Or is it the wrong speech caused by your cognitive error?  We have sacrificed tens of thousands of people for your misunderstanding here.
